snippet.title: Classic Game Room - BREAKOUT for Atari 2600 review
snippet.description:
Breakout review! http://www.ClassicGameRoom.com

Awwwwww BREAKOUT! Classic Game Room was the FIRST classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999. Returning in 2008 with new episodes, Classic Game Room breaks out a review of BREAKOUT for the Atari 2600 VCS video game console.  Use the Atari paddle controllers to bounce a mysterious alien ball into line after line of multi colored blocks. Sounds simple, but it isn't. 

This awesome game from the 1970's is a true retro arcade, coin-op, old school classic video game that is worth remembering. The Breakout style is legendary and influenced many other video games. Are you into retro gaming? Then you need to be into Breakout for the Atari.

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. Classic Game Room was the original classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999-2000, now on DVD. The HD series is reviewing PS3, Genesis, NES, Atari and Xbox 360. Xbox Live Arcade XBLA.  Reviews.
